body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.4 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for right-to-left mirrored windows.
Winelib now supports the ARM platform.
New taskkill.exe built-in application.
Inetcpl control panel fleshed out.
AcceptEx is implemented now.
Improved security checks for SSL connections.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
